creator: woeye@highteq.net
text:
the following example does not work:

new VariableInfo("id", "java.lang.Integer", true, VariableInfo.NESTED)

because it (jasper?) produces the following source code:

id = (String) pageContext.findAttribute("id");

therefore the jsp page fails with an ClassCastException :(

Tested with 3.2.1final and 3.2.2b1 and this seems to work fine.  Could you 
please provide a small example that demonstrates the problem?
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
